statement.p: Graphs generated by this script: initPicture(-15,55,-15,55);line(0,0,25,50);line(25,50,50,0);line(0,0,50,0);text(5,25,"20");text(45,25,"x");text(25,-5,"18");text(12,6,"16");circle(20,10,1), find the length of side \displaystyle{x} using the Law of Cosines. Round your final answer to 4 decimal places.
